attributes.action: make women who comitte the most serious of sexual offences receive a charge of rape.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present when a woman forces a person to have sex and charges are brought against her she receives a sentence for sexual assault.

Rape is forced sex so whenever a person forces another person to have sex they should be charged quite rightly with rape.

Rape is not a gender crime but a crime of control and force and can be commitied by men and women. 

The only diference is men get charged with rape while women have their ofence reduced to sexual assault.
